Uses of Package
tumble.gui

  • Packages that use tumble.gui 
    Package Description
    tumble.game
    All major game elements.
    tumble.gui
    All interface-related elements.
    tumble.gui.buttons
    All buttons.
    tumble.gui.screens
    All screens.
  • Classes in tumble.gui used by tumble.game 
    Class and Description
    Message
    Represents a colored message that spans the bottom of the screen.
  • Classes in tumble.gui used by tumble.gui 
    Class and Description
    Button
    Represents a circular solid button that can lead to other screens.
    DrawingSurface
    Represents a canvas onto which a game is drawn.
    KeyHandler
    Represents the mechanism for handling key-events.
    ScreenSwitcher
    Represents the mechanism for switching screens.
  • Classes in tumble.gui used by tumble.gui.buttons 
    Class and Description
    Button
    Represents a circular solid button that can lead to other screens.
    DrawingSurface
    Represents a canvas onto which a game is drawn.
  • Classes in tumble.gui used by tumble.gui.screens 
    Class and Description
    DrawingSurface
    Represents a canvas onto which a game is drawn.
    Screen
    Represents the superclass of all screens.
